attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With an ever increasing elderly population Alzheimer/dementia will be affecting greater numbers of people from the highest to the lowest in the land. Even Government officials will not be immune. Surely now is the time to increasing urgent funding to alleviate this terrible disease.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
